diff_hunk:
@@ -28,24 +36,26 @@ void THNN_(LogSoftMax_updateOutput)(
   uint64_t dim_stride = inner_size;
   uint64_t outer_stride = dim_size * dim_stride;
 
+  LOG_SOFTMAX_DEFINITIONS
+
 #pragma omp parallel for
-  for (uint64_t i = 0; i < outer_size * inner_size; i++)
+  LOG_SOFTMAX_FOR(i, 0, outer_size * inner_size)
body: MSVC only supports OpenMP 2.4, which does not support index variable definitions and unsigned index variable in the for statement. I know this one is not good, but can't figure out a better one.
body_html: MSVC only supports OpenMP 2.4, which does not support index variable definitions and unsigned index variable in the for statement. I know this one is not good, but can't figure out a better one.
body_text: MSVC only supports OpenMP 2.4, which does not support index variable definitions and unsigned index variable in the for statement. I know this one is not good, but can't figure out a better one.
